thread.title: European markets edge lower as political issues take center stage; WPP falls over 5% - CNBC

author: newsineuropa
title: European markets edge lower as political issues take center stage; WPP falls over 5% - CNBC
text: European markets edge lower as political issues take center stage; WPP falls over 5% - CNBC CNBC European markets edge lower as political issues take center stage; WPP falls over 5% CNBC Europe's food and beverages stocks were the worst performers, slipping over 1 percent amid earnings news. Marine Harvest's plans to operate an experimental fish farm to produce salmon was rejected by Norwegian regulators on Monday. This news followed ...
